2.7.18  1:11 pm   You say that you almost always write lyrics and the vocal melodies together.. but what about songs like la de da or outside that have multiple verses where the vocal melody is more or less the same? (Or maybe you meant that you never really write lyrics without a vocal melody in mind). I usually write the lyrics with the melody too and they both kind of feed one another. But I always hit a wall when trying to fit lyrics to a pre-set melody (like for the 2nd/3rd verse of a song). The lyrics seem more forced and unnatural when I'm trying to fit them in a place instead of making the place around them. I'll have a good verse 1 then the other verses kind of drop off. Any tips?
